pages.text: $(li)The Charcoal Block is a new decorative block that can be used to save $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/charcoal)Charcoal$(/l) in a more efficient way.

$(li)It can be used as a fuel to burn up to 80 items with only 1 block of Charcoal in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l), or a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(/l)
